name: react-vault-manager
description: A secure password vault manager built with React and Electron
author: React Vault Manager Team

scripts.build: cross-env BUILD_DIR=build/web vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('build/web/build-info.json', JSON.stringify({version: '1.0.0', buildTime: new Date().toISOString(), target: 'web'}, null, 2))"
scripts.build:web: cross-env BUILD_DIR=build/web vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('build/web/build-info.json', JSON.stringify({version: '1.0.0', buildTime: new Date().toISOString(), target: 'web'}, null, 2))"
scripts.build:electron: cross-env BUILD_DIR=build/electron vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('build/electron/build-info.json', JSON.stringify({version: '1.0.0', buildTime: new Date().toISOString(), target: 'electron'}, null, 2))"
scripts.build:tauri: cross-env BUILD_DIR=build/tauri vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('build/tauri/build-info.json', JSON.stringify({version: '1.0.0', buildTime: new Date().toISOString(), target: 'tauri'}, null, 2))"
scripts.build:mobile: cross-env BUILD_DIR=build/mobile vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('build/mobile/build-info.json', JSON.stringify({version: '1.0.0', buildTime: new Date().toISOString(), target: 'mobile'}, null, 2))"
scripts.electron:build: npm run build:electron && electron-builder install-app-deps && npx electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.sync:android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync android
scripts.sync:ios: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync ios
